app.description: A tool that allows you to easily mix and organize tracks in Spotify playlists.
app.title: Shuffler for Spotify playlists

auth.error_while_logging_in: An error occurred while logging in

undo_changes.question: Can I undo changes after shuffling a playlist?
undo_changes.answer: Unfortunately, once a playlist is shuffled, there is no way to undo the changes.

login_security.question: Is logging into the app secure?
login_security.answer: Yes, logging in is done automatically through Spotify. The app only has access to the data provided by Spotify, such as playlist information and public account details, which ensures security.

sorting_options.question: What sorting options are available?
sorting_options.answer: The app offers several sorting options: by song duration, date added to the playlist, popularity, and randomly.
